Uses of Package
org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.rap.rwt  
    org.eclipse.rap.rwt.application  
    org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle  
  • Classes in org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle used by org.eclipse.rap.rwt 
    Class and Description
    ILifeCycle
    Deprecated. 
    As of 2.0, PhaseListeners should only be registered in an ApplicationConfiguration. For new applications and custom widgets, consider the (still internal) RemoteObject API which is going to replace PhaseListener.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle used by org.eclipse.rap.rwt.application 
    Class and Description
    PhaseListener
    Deprecated. 
    Support for PhaseListeners is going to be removed in the future.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle used by org.eclipse.rap.rwt.lifecycle 
    Class and Description
    AbstractWidgetLCA
    Deprecated. 
    New custom widgets should use the RemoteObject API instead of LCAs.
    ILifeCycle
    Deprecated. 
    As of 2.0, PhaseListeners should only be registered in an ApplicationConfiguration. For new applications and custom widgets, consider the (still internal) RemoteObject API which is going to replace PhaseListener.
    PhaseEvent
    Deprecated. 
    Support for PhaseListeners is going to be removed in the future.
    PhaseId
    Deprecated. 
    Support for PhaseListeners is going to be removed in the future.
    PhaseListener
    Deprecated. 
    Support for PhaseListeners is going to be removed in the future.
    WidgetAdapter
    Deprecated. 
    This adapter interface was provided to facilitate the implementation of LCAs. New custom widgets should use the RemoteObject API instead of LCAs.
